# Development requirements for Forzium API
# 
# This file is generated from Poetry for development convenience.
# The main dependencies are defined in pyproject.toml
#
# To install the project properly, use:
# poetry install
#
# Or for GPU support:
# poetry install --extras gpu
#
# To regenerate this file:
# poetry export -f requirements.txt --output requirements.txt --with dev
